DOC.brief_summary: To test whether long-acting Triptorelin pituitary down-regulation improve clinical pregnancy rate reduces incidence ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) infertile high-risk patient polycystic ovary ( PCOs ) underwent vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Intracytoplasmic sperm injection
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Long-acting Short Acting Triptorelin PCOS Patients Who Underwent IVF/ICSI
DOC.detailed_description: All patient receive standard ovarian stimulation rFSH pituitary suppression GnRH agonist accord protocol use routinely . The long-acting Triptorelin group use long-acting Triptorelin 1.875mg luteal phase Pituitary down-regulation , Short act Triptorelin use short-acting Triptorelin 0.1mg/d , x10d , 0.05mg/d E2 < 40pg/ml serum , initiate luteal phase . Gonadotrophin stimulation ovary start serum E2 concentration decline < 40 pg/ml vaginal ultrasonographic scan show absence follicle > 10mm diameter . Ovarian stimulation start wih 150-250 IU/day recombinant FSH ( Gonal F , Serono , Switzerland ) ; initial dose determine clinical judgement clinician accord patient 's age , body mass index , basal FSH E2 . Transvaginal ultrasound E2 measurement use monitor follicular growth , gonadotropin dosage adjust accordingly . Ovulation trigger intramuscular administration 5000-10,000 IU human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG , Ferring Pharmaceuticals ) least two follicle reach diameter 18 mm . Serum HCG value measure 12 h HCG trigger use immunoassay . Oocytes retrieve 36 h injection HCG .
DOC.criteria: PCOS patient diagnosis Rotterdam Consensus Diagnostic Criteria underwent IVF/ICSI treatment Patients poor ovarian reserve , immunological disease , endometriosis , uterine abnormality , endometrium thickness < 8mm embryo transfer , few two goodquality embryo available transfer patient inadequate data analysis exclude .
